thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 11 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Cooper Tire & Rubber Company Outlines Strategic Plan At Investor Day Provides Mid-Term Financial Targets

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cooper Tire & Rubber Company Outlines Strategic Plan At Investor Day Provides Mid-Term Financial Targets

organizations.name: mid-term financial targets cooper tire & rubber co

text:
Cooper Tire & Rubber Co:
* COOPER TIRE & RUBBER COMPANY OUTLINES STRATEGIC PLAN AT INVESTOR DAY; PROVIDES MID-TERM FINANCIAL TARGETS
* COOPER TIRE & RUBBER - AT INVESTOR DAY, MANAGEMENT DETAILED PLANS TO SUPPORT FIVE-YEAR MID-TERM TARGETS FOR OPERATING PROFIT OF 10 PERCENT TO 14 PERCENT
* COOPER TIRE & RUBBER CO - DETAILED PLANS TO SUPPORT FIVE-YEAR MID-TERM TARGETS FOR ANNUAL UNIT VOLUME GROWTH IN LOW- TO MID-SINGLE DIGITS
* COOPER TIRE & RUBBER CO - DETAILED PLANS TO SUPPORT FIVE-YEAR MID-TERM TARGETS FOR RETURN ON INVESTED CAPITAL OF 14 PERCENT TO 16 PERCENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
